homedata.title: Subjects
homedata.description: "GH Notes Available" is an educational web platform designed to provide interactive practice exams for students. Select your desired subject to get started with your exams

homedata.title: Contact
homedata.description: "GH Notes Available" is always available for contacts. You send what you have to us to improve and we will follow and work on it. We hope you have a good time with our app and would love to share, if not so happy, just give us the reason and we will work on it.

homedata.title: About
homedata.description: "GH Notes Available" is a thoughtfully designed educational tool that combines simplicity with powerful functionality. Its parameter-driven navigation, separate data storage, interactive verification, and modern UI/UX make it an effective resource for mathematics students...
